official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to repeal the regulatory authority under that act respecting effectiveness of drugs.

summary.text: Repeals the regulatory authority under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act respecting effectiveness of drugs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to repeal the regulatory authority under that act respecting effectiveness of drugs.
